meanings.sent1: The atactic dance performance seemed random and uncoordinated.
meanings.sent2: The atactic pile of papers on his desk made it hard to find anything.
meanings.sent3: The atactic group of kids playing tag kept bumping into each other.
meanings.sent4: Her atactic thoughts wandered aimlessly like lost puppies.
meanings.sent5: The atactic traffic jam was a chaotic mess of cars going in all directions.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a lack of structure or organization
meanings.sent1: The atactic jumble of wires behind the TV was a confusing mess.
meanings.sent2: His atactic schedule caused him to miss important appointments.
meanings.sent3: The atactic arrangement of books on the shelf made it hard to find the right one.
meanings.sent4: Her atactic wardrobe consisted of random pieces that didn't match.
meanings.sent5: The atactic garden grew wild with plants growing wherever they pleased.
